title: Executive Order 7056-Designating the Deputy Administrator, Federal Emergency Administration of Public Works, as a Member of the Advisory Committee on Allotments
content: Executive Order No. 7034, of May 6, 1935, insofar as it establishes the Advisory Committee on Allotments, is hereby amended so as to include in the membership of said Committee the Deputy Administrator of the Federal Emergency Administration of Public Works.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7056-Designating the Deputy Administrator, Federal Emergency Administration of Public Works, as a Member of the Advisory Committee on Allotments Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/376117
